Congratulations
tiddlers.text:
By clicking the "Begin" button you have created your first Tiddler!

A Tiddler is just a block of text, like the one you are reading now.

Each tiddler can however do more than just store text, it can run code!

Click the following button to see how code can change your twiki:

<<welcome.Step2Button>>
